i prefer to be secluded from the world, for the most part. my favorite spice is aleppo pepper. i really like anime and manga. i have a calico cat named rosie.

i've always been very passionate about what i love, and i have over 150 different interests. my listography with everything i like, you can ask for... i have too many hobbies to name and a lot of favorite media.

my two favorite characters in the world are satori and koishi from touhou project.

i am against dnis, especially very long ones with lots of terminally online lingo. i want to believe in whatever i want and like whatever i want.

you won't find any of my other socials on this website. (i prefer to be relatively private...)

I taste like Smoke.
I'm an unusual taste; I can be strong and potent, or I can be a mere hint, almost not there. I can blow away on the wind, or I can stick to your clothes that you left out when your neighbour was having a bonfire. I'm mean that way. What Flavour Are You?
